mapper.select: SELECT tou.out_id, tof.original_name, tof.volume, tof.volume_text, te.name, tou.cat_id, tof.update_at, tp.name AS project_name FROM TBL_OUTPUT tou, TBL_OUT_FILE tof, TBL_EMP te, TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp WHERE tou.out_id = tof.out_id AND tou.emp_id = te.emp_id AND tou.task_id = tt.task_id AND tt.prj_id = tp.prj_id AND tou.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY tou.out_id DESC

SELECT DISTINCT tp.prj_id AS projectId, tp.name AS title FROM TBL_OUTPUT tou, TBL_TASK tt, TBL_PROJECT tp WHERE tou.task_id = tt.task_id AND tt.prj_id = tp.prj_id AND tou.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY title ASC

SELECT tof.original_name, tof.save_name, toc.category, tot.out_type, tou.content FROM TBL_OUTPUT tou, TBL_OUT_FILE tof, TBL_OUT_TYPE tot, TBL_OUT_CATEGORY toc WHERE tou.out_id = tof.out_id AND tou.out_type_id = tot.out_type_id AND tou.cat_id = toc.cat_id AND tou.task_id = #{taskId} AND tou.emp_id = #{empId}
SELECT DISTINCT tp.prj_id, tp.name FROM TBL_PROJECT tp, TBL_RESOURCE tr WHERE tp.prj_id = tr.prj_id AND tp.prj_status_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND tr.emp_id = #{empId} ORDER BY tp.name
